name: Nail Art: Nail Salon Games
description:
The best game you’ve ever had to get nails done! 

Explore creative and beautiful nail art and designs to inspire your next manicure!


GAME FEATURES:

- Realistic manicure simulation
You can start our game anytime and anywhere, feeling easy to get awesome immersive manicure experiences on your own. The mani came out beautifully as well. 

- Various nail ideas 
You can experiment with various lengths, shapes, textures, and play around with different colors to design a fabulous look. Plus, longer nails elongate your fingers, allowing for gorgeous nail art. 

- Incredible nail designs
Get your nails done with such four themes as stencil, pattern, painting, and sticker. Incredibly, you can decorate your nails with trending gradients, glitters, textures, and elements including unicorn, piggy, diamonds, stars, graffiti, marble, to name just a few.

- Terrific nails show 
Match your exceptional DIY nail artworks with dreamy canvas, rings, and ornaments to complete a stylish look. It’s time to design your nail art and create this manicure for yourself!


Design your fashionable nail looks in Nail Art and share them with your friends!
